item.title: Suspects sought after 9 killed in South Africa tavern mass shooting
item.description: A group of about a dozen assailants opened fire Sunday at a tavern in a South African township, police said.

item.title: WATCH: Educator goes big with lessons involving a 43-foot whale
item.description: ABC News' Danny New explains why Jessica Woodend is travelling around her home state of Maine with a giant inflatable whale.
